titles.title: To authorize an additional district judgeship for the district of Idaho.
To authorize an additional district judgeship for the district of Idaho.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill increases from two to three the total number of U.S. district court judgeships for the District of Idaho. The President must appoint, with the advice and consent of the Senate, one additional judge for that judicial district.
